{{cpp/title|fetestexcept}}
{{cpp/numeric/fenv/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header | cfenv}}
{{dcl | since=c++11 |
int fetestexcept( int excepts );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Determines which of the specified subset of the floating point exceptions are currently set. The argument {{tt|excepts}} is a bitwise OR of the [[cpp/numeric/fenv/FE_exceptions|floating point exception macros]].

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | excepts | bitmask listing the exception flags to test}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Bitwise OR of the floating-point exception macros that are both included in {{tt|excepts}} and correspond to floating-point exceptions currently set.
